title: Kiwi dollar falls ahead of RBNZ review
content: THE New Zealand dollar has fallen against the greenback and the Australian dollar as traders look ahead to the Reserve Bank's policy review amid expectations of an interest rate cut. THE kiwi fell to 62.64 US cents as at 5pm in Wellington, from 62.77 cents at the New York close on Friday. It fell to 90.48 Australian cents from 91.25 cents on Friday.
